Package com.example.basic.persons.insfrastructure.adapters.input.controllers

Class DoctorController

java.lang.Object
com.example.basic.persons.insfrastructure.adapters.input.controllers.DoctorController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/doctors") public class DoctorController extends Object
Controlador REST para gestionar operaciones relacionadas con doctores.
